summary.span: 表示一个可能由弧、曲线、椭圆、直线和矩形组成的复杂形状。

span.span: Represents a complex shape that may be composed of arcs, curves, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个对象定义的集合对象。Each object defines a collection of objects. 每个对象由一个或多个组成对象，如和，它们实际上定义了其形状。Each of the objects is composed of one or more objects, such as and , which actually define their shape. 填充的区域通过将所包含的所有定义对象具有其属性设置为`true`并应用以确定的封闭的区域。The filled area of the is defined by taking all of the contained objects that have their property set to `true` and applying the to determine the enclosed area.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::FillRule FillRule { System::Windows::Media::FillRule get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::FillRule value); };
member this.FillRule : System.Windows.Media.FillRule with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定如何组合此 中包含的相交区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this are combined.

value.span: 指示如何组合此 的相交区域。

span.span: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this are combined.
The default value is EvenOdd.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **EvenOdd**确定的"内在"形状上的点绘制一条从该点沿任意方向，从给定形状与射线相交的路径段的计数。**EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses. 如果此数目为奇数，那么该点则在内部；如果为偶数，则该点在外部。If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside. **非零**从该点沿任意方向绘制一条射线，并检查段形状与射线相交的位置的位置确定是否在"内部"的形状上的点。**NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. 从零计数开始，从左到右每次添加与射线相交的一个段，然后从右到左每次减去与射线相交的一个路径段。Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. 在对交叉点进行计数后，如果结果为零，那么该点则位于路径外。After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path. 否则，该点则在路径内。Otherwise, it is inside. ![填充规则图](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填充规则图")![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule 示例FillRule Example ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
